description.narrative: It is anticipated this project will have a high developmental impact by: i) providing funding to underserved segments in IDA countries, particularly women and youth. Over 95% of FINCA's clients in Africa are women and this funding will support portfolio growth and geographic expansion. ii) diversifying funding sources for FINCA's affiliates in Africa, and iii) increasing the tenor of local currency financing available in the local markets.

The project involves a US$10 million equivalent debt facility for FINCAs African affiliates in DRC, Tanzania and a proposed greenfield in Nigeria. The proposed loans will be denominated in local currency in Tanzania and Nigeria and will support the expansion of lending activities to MSMEs in Tanzania, DRC and Nigeria. FINCAs strategy in Africa is to focus operations on underserved markets and groups, namely rural areas and women.
